TEXT.English: %s1 will grow to size %d2 next turn.
TEXT.French: %s1 will grow to size %d2 next turn.
TEXT.German: %s1 will grow to size %d2 next turn.
TEXT.Italian: %s1 will grow to size %d2 next turn.
TEXT.Spanish: %s1 will grow to size %d2 next turn.

TEXT.English: [H1]Platy User Interface[\H1][H2][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]CTRL F1[COLOR_REVERT][\H2]Expands the help text section, saved into Event Log.[NEWLINE][H2][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]CTRL F2[COLOR_REVERT][\H2]Tracks Units led by Great Generals.[NEWLINE][H2][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]CTRL F9[COLOR_REVERT][\H2]Checks for unused and missing Art and Movie Defines.[NEWLINE][H2][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]CTRL F10[COLOR_REVERT][\H2]Displays location of XML tags and identify duplicates.[NEWLINE][H2][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]CTRL F11[COLOR_REVERT][\H2]Displays ID, icon, type and text for various items.[NEWLINE][H2][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]CTRL F12[COLOR_REVERT][\H2]Monitors time for gamespeed adjustments.

TEXT.English: [H1]Version 4.0[\H1][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Added this [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Intro Section[COLOR_REVERT] for Modders to introduce their mods to new players.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]No longer display buildings without relevant data in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Building Chart.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [H1]Mod Components[\H1][H2][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Platy Pedia[COLOR_REVERT][\H2]Advanced Pedia with more information and sorting functions. Coded by [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Platyping[COLOR_REVERT]. Modified Upgrade Tree from Sevopedia originally by [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Vovan[COLOR_REVERT]. [H2][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Platy Builder[COLOR_REVERT][\H2]Advanced World Builder with new functions and abilities. Coded by [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]Platyping[COLOR_REVERT].
